heading: ingenie Business
body:
Been building website in various languages for some time now. Mainly used Angualar in a commercial environment. Proficient in custom CMS theming in wordpress as well as using headless CMS to serve apps.
Adhere to best practices and creating maintainable, tested code. Always willing to learn more and wanting to make web experiences as engaging, accessible and user friendly as possible for user/clients
